Forms.Name: Course Drop - End State
Forms.Html: The requested course will be dropped from your schedule.

Forms.Name: Student Course Drop Form
Forms.Title: Student Course Drop Form
Forms.Html: By dropping a course, you (the student) understand Academic Progress and/or graduation dates may be affected. Also any financial aid eligibility may be affected. There may be a drop fee associated with this request.

<State.Entry> <Sequence DisplayName="Find Student" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1"> <cnfw:LookupUser sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LookupUser_1" UserId="[studentid]" UserName="[forminstance.UserName]" ValidationMessages="[forminstance.ValidationMessages]" /> <ccwae:GetEntity x:TypeArguments="cnce:StudentEntity" EntityId="[studentid]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="GetEntity`1_1" Result="[studentEntity]" /> <Assign DisplayName="Assign Name" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_1"> <Assign.To> <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[FullName]</OutArgument> </Assign.To> <Assign.Value> <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[studentEntity.FirstName + " " + studentEntity.LastName]</InArgument> </Assign.Value> </Assign> <ccwa:LogLine Text="["Student dropping course: " & FullName]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_3" /> </Sequence> </State.Entry> <State.Transitions> <Transition DisplayName="Submit" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Transition_1"> <Transition.Trigger> <Sequence DisplayName="Add Doc and Drop Course" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_3"> <cnfw:WaitForFormBookmark DisplayName="Submit" DisplayOrder="0" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="WaitForFormBookmark_1" TransitionType="Default" /> <Sequence DisplayName="Print PDF to URL" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_4"> <Assign DisplayName="Assign URL" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_2"> <Assign.To> <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[URL]</OutArgument> </Assign.To> <Assign.Value> <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[forminstance.RendererBaseUrl + "#/viewCreator/" + formInstance.WorkflowDefinitionId.ToString + "/forms=Student+Course+Drop+Form"]</InArgument> </Assign.Value> </Assign> <Persist sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Persist_1" /> <cnfw:PrintUrlToPdf sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="PrintUrlToPdf_1" PdfDocument="[Pdf]" Url="[URL]" ValidationMessages="[forminstance.ValidationMessages]" /> </Sequence> <Sequence DisplayName="Add to Doc Center" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_2"> <cncw:CreateDocument AwardYear="{x:Null}" ExpirationDate="{x:Null}" ModuleId="{x:Null}" ReceivedDate="{x:Null}" SentDate="{x:Null}" ValidationMessages="{x:Null}" WorkFlowInstanceId="{x:Null}" Document="[StuDrop]" DocumentImage="[Pdf]" DocumentStatusId="2" DocumentTypeId="451" DueDate="[datetime.Today]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CreateDocument_1" ImageFileName="StudentDropCourse.pdf" Note="Student Drop Course Form Submitted Online" RequestDate="[datetime.Today]" StudentId="[studentid]" /> <Assign DisplayName="Assign Received Date" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_4"> <Assign.To> <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(s:DateTime)">[StuDrop.ReceivedDate]</OutArgument> </Assign.To> <Assign.Value> <InArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(s:DateTime)">[datetime.Today]</InArgument> </Assign.Value> </Assign> <Assign DisplayName="Assign Approved Date" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_5"> <Assign.To> <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(s:DateTime)">[StuDrop.ApprovedDate]</OutArgument> </Assign.To> <Assign.Value> <InArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(s:DateTime)">[datetime.Today]</InArgument> </Assign.Value> </Assign> <cncw:SaveDocument Document="[StuDrop]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="SaveDocument_1" ValidationMessages="[forminstance.ValidationMessages]" /> <ccwa:LogLine Text="["Drop Course Form Added for Student: " & FullName]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_4" /> </Sequence> <Sequence DisplayName="Drop Course" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_5"> <ccwae:GetEntity x:TypeArguments="cnae:StudentCourseStatusChangeReasonEntity" EntityId="[studentCourseStatusChangeReasonEntity.Id]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="GetEntity`1_3" Result="[studentCourseStatusChangeReasonEntity]" /> <ccwa:LogLine Text="Status Change Reason Entity" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_5" /> <ccwa:LogObject sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogObject_2" Object="[studentCourseStatusChangeReasonEntity]" /> <ccwae:GetEntity x:TypeArguments="cnae:StudentEnrollmentPeriodEntity" EntityId="[studentEnrollmentPeriodEntity.Id]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="GetEntity`1_4" Result="[studentEnrollmentPeriodEntity]" /> <ccwa:LogLine Text="Student Enrollment Period Entity" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_6" /> <ccwa:LogObject sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogObject_3" Object="[studentEnrollmentPeriodEntity]" /> <ccwae:GetEntity x:TypeArguments="cnae:StudentCourseEntity" EntityId="[studentCourseEntity.CourseId]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="GetEntity`1_2" Result="[studentCourseEntity]" /> <Assign DisplayName="Map ID" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_6"> <Assign.To> <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(x:Int32)">[studentCourseEntity.StudentEnrollmentPeriodId]</OutArgument> </Assign.To> <Assign.Value> <InArgument x:TypeArguments="s:Nullable(x:Int32)">[studentEnrollmentPeriodEntity.Id]</InArgument> </Assign.Value> </Assign> <ccwa:LogLine Text="Student Course Entity" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_7" /> <ccwa:LogObject sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogObject_4" Object="[studentCourseEntity]" /> <ccwa:ExecuteNonQuery TotalRowsAffected="{x:Null}" CommandText="["exec c2ksp_AdDropClass @EnrollSchedID = " & studentCourseEntity.ID &", @DropDate = '"& DropDate &"', @LetterGrade = '" & LetterGrade & "', @UserID = "& UserID &", @AdCourseStatusChangeReasonID = " & studentCourseStatusChangeReasonEntity.Id]" DisplayName="Exec Proc to Drop Course" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ExecuteNonQuery_1" /> <ccwa:LogLine DisplayName="Log Course Dropped " sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="LogLine_2" Text="[environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + "The course: " + studentCourseEntity.CourseId.ToString + "has been dropped for student: " + studentCourseEntity.StudentId.ToString]" /> </Sequence> </Sequence> </Transition.Trigger> <Transition.Condition>[not FormInstance.ValidationMessages.HasErrors]</Transition.Condition> <Transition.To>
